title: 49ers Eliminate Eagles 23 19 in NFL Wild Card Comeback
snippets: The San Francisco 49ers come from behind twice in the final quarter to knock out defending champions Philadelphia as a thrilling NFL play-off series continues.
The San Francisco 49ers pulled off a sensational 23-19 upset of the defending Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles to knock them out of the NFL playoffs in the Wild Card round.

Brock Purdy threw a go-ahead 6-yard touchdown pass to Christian McCaffery late in the fourth quarter, San Francisco used a trick play on a TD toss from wide receiver Jauan Jennings, and the 49ers eliminated the defending Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles with a 23-19 wild-card victory Sunday.

summary: The San Francisco 49ers defeated the defending Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles 23-19 in the NFL playoffs' Wild Card round, coming from behind twice in the final quarter. Key plays included a late touchdown pass from Brock Purdy to Christian McCaffery and a trick play touchdown by Jauan Jennings.
